  • oslab_utils.triangulation.triangulate_stereo

oslab_utils.triangulation.triangulate_stereo¶

oslab_utils.triangulation.triangulate_stereo(projection_matrix1, projection_matrix2, undistorted_points1, undistorted_points2)[source]¶

Triangulates the 3D position of points in Euclidean coordinates from two camera views.

Args:

projection_matrix1 (np.array): Projection matrix of the first camera. projection_matrix2 (np.array): Projection matrix of the second camera. undistorted_points1 (np.array): Coordinates of undistorted points from camera 1. undistorted_points2 (np.array): Coordinates of undistorted points from camera 2.

Returns:

np.array: The 3D position of points in Euclidean coordinates.
